00029 #ifndef _AAL5RECMULT_H
00030 #define _AAL5RECMULT_H
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 #include "queue.h"
00034 
00035 class   aal5recMult:    public in1out
00036 {
00037 typedef in1out  baseclass;
00038 public:
00039         void    init(void);
00040         rec_typ REC(data *, int);       // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00041 
00042         int     command(char *, tok_typ *);
00043         int     export(exp_typ *);
00044 
00045         int     maxvci;                 // range of VCIs
00046 
00047         // Statistic    
00048         int     *q_len;
00049 
00050         int     *cell_loss;             // detected cell loss
00051         int     *sdu_loss;              // detected loss of AAL SDUs
00052         int     *last_cell;             // sequence number of last cell
00053         aal5Cell        **first_cell;   // points to the first cell of the current frame
00054                                         // == NULL, if beginning of next frame is expected
00055         int     *last_sdu;              // sequence number of last valid SDU
00056         unsigned int    *sdu_cnt;               // counter of AAL SDUs
00057         unsigned int    *cell_cnt;              // counter of cells
00058 
00059         double  *delay_mean;            // mean delay of AAL SDUs
00060         int     doCopyCid;              // TRUE: copy VCI of cells into connection ID of packets
00061         int     doCopyClp;              // TRUE: copy CLP bit of last cell (pt=1) into clp bit of packets
00062 };
00063 
00064 #endif  // _AAL5RECMULT_H
